name: Carrots and Cream (itch)
description:
@AergiaGame - aergia.dk - itch profile

A short horror game about picking carrots, making dinner and all sorts of other spooky things!

Made for the AsylumJam 2015 on GameJolt.

Original GameJolt page.

Play with the mouse/touch. Click and sometimes click+drag.

If the game runs slow (especially on older Android devices, turn off 'effects' in the menu)

Source on GitHub


"Luckily, I'm not such a big eater of carrots. For if I were I think playing the Asylum Jam entry Carrots and Cream would have been [...] detrimental to my life."
- Kill Screen "I'm not sure I'll ever look at carrots in quite the same way again."
- PC Gamer #288

"Absolutely horrific tale involving vitamin-rich carrots and thick, delicious cream. Short but definitely not sweet."
- Rock, Paper, Shotgun

Version 1.1:

  • Added 'Effects' option to menu, turn off to disable full screen image effects on older hardware.
  • Fixed some minor issues, mainly related to timing of audio and animations.
